languages.text: Each time the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}, they gain a stack of the strategic perfection effect. At 6 stacks of strategic perfection, the next stratagem applies the benefits of all stratagems known by the Grand Strategist, then all the stacks are removed.
languages.original_text: При каждом использовании стратагемы великий {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}стратег{/g} получает уровень эффекта "{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}стратегическое{/g} превосходство". При накоплении 6 уровней следующая {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}стратагема{/g} предоставляет преимущества всех известных великому {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}стратегу{/g} стратагем, после чего уровни обнуляются.

traits.locale_text: Each time the Strategist uses a stratagem, they gain a stack of the Strategic Perfection effect. At 6 stacks of Strategic Perfection, the next stratagem applies the benefits of all stratagems known by the strategist, then all the stacks are removed.

Each time the Strategist uses a stratagem, they gain a stack of the strategic perfection effect. At 6 stacks of strategic perfection, the next stratagem applies the benefits of all stratagems known by the Strategist, then all the stacks are removed.

Each time the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}, they gain a stack of the strategic perfection effect. At 6 stacks of strategic perfection, the next stratagem applies the benefits of all stratagems known by the Grand Strategist, then all the stacks are removed.

Each time the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}, they gain a stack of the strategic perfection effect. At 6 stacks of strategic perfection, the next stratagem applies the benefits of all stratagems known by the Grand Strategist, then all the stacks are removed.

languages.text: При каждом использовании стратагемы великий {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}стратег{/g} получает уровень эффекта "{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}стратегическое{/g} превосходство". При накоплении 6 уровней следующая {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}стратагема{/g} предоставляет преимущества всех известных великому {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}стратегу{/g} стратагем, после чего уровни обнуляются.
languages.original_text: Each time the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}, they gain a stack of the strategic perfection effect. At 6 stacks of strategic perfection, the next stratagem applies the benefits of all stratagems known by the Grand Strategist, then all the stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: При каждом использовании стратагемы стратег получает уровень эффекта "стратегическое превосходство". При накоплении 6 уровней следующая стратагема предоставляет преимущества всех известных стратегу стратагем, после чего уровни обнуляются.

При каждом использовании стратагемы стратег получает уровень эффекта "стратегическое превосходство". При накоплении 6 уровней следующая стратагема предоставляет преимущества всех известных стратегу стратагем, после чего уровни обнуляются.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}战略大师{/g}使用{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}战略能力{/g}时，都会获得1层“完美战略”层数。当战略大师拥有6层“完美战略”层数时，下次战略能力会消耗所有层数，额外施加战略大师所有已解锁的战略能力效果。
languages.original_text: Each time the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}, they gain a stack of the strategic perfection effect. At 6 stacks of strategic perfection, the next stratagem applies the benefits of all stratagems known by the Grand Strategist, then all the stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: 每当战略大师使用战略能力时，都会获得1层“完美战略”层数。当战略大师拥有6层“完美战略”层数时，下次战略能力会消耗所有层数，添加战略大师所有已解锁的战略能力效果。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}gran estratega{/g} utilice una {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}estratagema{/g}, gana una acumulación del efecto perfección estratégica. Con 6 acumulaciones de perfección estratégica, la próxima estratagema aplica los beneficios de todas las estratagemas conocidas por el gran estratega. Después se eliminan todas las acumulaciones.
languages.original_text: Each time the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}, they gain a stack of the strategic perfection effect. At 6 stacks of strategic perfection, the next stratagem applies the benefits of all stratagems known by the Grand Strategist, then all the stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}gran estratega{/g} utilice una {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}estratagema{/g}, gana una acumulación del efecto perfección estratégica. Con 6 acumulaciones de perfección estratégica, la próxima estratagema aplica los beneficios de todas las estratagemas conocidas por el gran estratega. Después se eliminan todas las acumulaciones.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstratege{/g} ein {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}Strategem{/g} anwendet, erlangt er 1 Stapel des Effekts Strategische Perfektion. Sobald er 6 Stapel davon angesammelt hat, wendet das nächste Strategem die Vorteile aller dem Großstrategen bekannten Strategeme an. Danach werden sämtliche Stapel entfernt.
languages.original_text: Each time the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}, they gain a stack of the strategic perfection effect. At 6 stacks of strategic perfection, the next stratagem applies the benefits of all stratagems known by the Grand Strategist, then all the stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Jedes Mal, wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstratege{/g} ein {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}Strategem{/g} anwendet, erlangt er 1 Stapel des Effekts Strategische Perfektion. Sobald er 6 Stapel davon angesammelt hat, wendet das nächste Strategem die Vorteile aller dem Großstrategen bekannten Strategeme an. Danach werden sämtliche Stapel entfernt.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}grand stratège{/g} utilise un {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagème{/g}, l'effet Perfection stratégique se cumule. Au bout de 6 cumuls, le stratagème suivant applique les avantages de tous les stratagèmes connus du grand stratège, puis tous les cumuls sont supprimés.
languages.original_text: Each time the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}, they gain a stack of the strategic perfection effect. At 6 stacks of strategic perfection, the next stratagem applies the benefits of all stratagems known by the Grand Strategist, then all the stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le Stratège utilise un Stratagème, l'effet Perfection Stratégique se cumule. Au bout de 6 cumuls, le stratagème suivant applique les avantages de tous les stratagèmes connus du Stratège, puis tous les cumuls sont supprimés.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}大戦略家{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}計略{/g}を使用するたびに、「完全なる戦略」を1スタック得る。「完全なる戦略」が6スタックになると、次の計略はその戦略家が習得しているすべての計略の効果を発揮し、スタックは取り除かれる。
languages.original_text: Each time the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}, they gain a stack of the strategic perfection effect. At 6 stacks of strategic perfection, the next stratagem applies the benefits of all stratagems known by the Grand Strategist, then all the stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}大戦略家{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}計略{/g}を使用するたびに、「完全なる戦略」を1スタック得る。「完全なる戦略」が6スタックになると、次の計略はその戦略家が習得しているすべての計略の効果を発揮し、スタックは取り除かれる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Büyük Stratejist{/g} her {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}savaş hilesi{/g} kullandığında bir stratejik kusursuzluk etkisi birikimi kazanır. Stratejik kusursuzluk birikimi 6'ya ulaştığında bir sonraki savaş hilesi, Büyük Stratejist'in bildiği tüm savaş hilelerinin sağladığı faydaları uygular. Ardından tüm birikim sıfırlanır.
languages.original_text: Each time the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}, they gain a stack of the strategic perfection effect. At 6 stacks of strategic perfection, the next stratagem applies the benefits of all stratagems known by the Grand Strategist, then all the stacks are removed.
